title: DevGame programmers wanted
author: VD
content_html: If you’re a Unity programmer, you took the DevGame course, and you’re interested in a VOLUNTEER dev project, email me. We need two more programmers for a wargame DevGame project; we need one focused on UI and the other on AI.
content_text: If you’re a Unity programmer, you took the DevGame course, and you’re interested in a VOLUNTEER dev project, email me. We need two more programmers for a wargame DevGame project; we need one focused on UI and the other on AI.
